changeSet.author: lsy
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `swms_mdm`.`dictionarypo`(`id`, `code`, `description`, `editable`, `items`, `name`, `version`) VALUES (1, 'EDITABLE', '{\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是否允许编辑\"}}', b'0', '[{\"order\": 1, \"value\": \"true\", \"defaultItem\": true, \"description\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"允许编辑\"}}, \"showContext\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是\"}}}, {\"order\": 2, \"value\": \"false\", \"defaultItem\": true, \"description\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"允许编辑\"}}, \"showContext\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"否\"}}}]', '{\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是否允许编辑\"}}', 0); INSERT INTO `swms_mdm`.`dictionarypo`(`id`, `code`, `description`, `editable`, `items`, `name`, `version`) VALUES (2, 'IS_DEFAULT', '{\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是否默认\"}}', b'0', '[{\"order\": 1, \"value\": \"true\", \"defaultItem\": true, \"description\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是否默认\"}}, \"showContext\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是\"}}}, {\"order\": 2, \"value\": \"false\", \"defaultItem\": true, \"description\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是否默认\"}}, \"showContext\": {\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"否\"}}}]', '{\"languages\": {\"zh_CN\": \"是否默认\"}}', 0);
